INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (1, 'Work from Home Policy', 'This policy allows employees to work from home under certain conditions.', '2022-01-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (2, 'Flexible Work Hours Policy', 'This policy enables employees to choose their work hours within the specified range.', '2022-02-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (3, 'Remote Work Equipment Policy', 'This policy outlines the procedures for providing remote work equipment to employees.', '2022-03-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (4, 'Telecommuting Policy', 'This policy defines the guidelines for telecommuting arrangements for employees.', '2022-04-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (5, 'Virtual Meeting Policy', 'This policy establishes the protocols for conducting virtual meetings.', '2022-05-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (6, 'Remote Work Security Policy', 'This policy addresses the security measures for remote work environments.', '2022-06-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (7, 'Travel Policy', 'This policy regulates work-related travel arrangements for employees.', '2022-07-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (8, 'Remote Work Communication Policy', 'This policy outlines the communication guidelines for remote work teams.', '2022-08-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (9, 'Remote Work Training Policy', 'This policy defines the training requirements for employees working remotely.', '2022-09-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (10, 'Remote Work Performance Policy', 'This policy sets the performance expectations for employees in remote work setups.', '2022-10-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (11, 'Remote Work Health and Safety Policy', 'This policy focuses on the health and safety measures for remote workers.', '2022-11-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (12, 'Remote Work Productivity Policy', 'This policy aims to enhance productivity in remote work environments.', '2022-12-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (13, 'Remote Work Time Tracking Policy', 'This policy requires employees to accurately track their work hours while working remotely.', '2023-01-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (14, 'Internet Usage Policy', 'This policy governs the use of the internet for work purposes during remote work.', '2023-02-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (15, 'Remote Work Privacy Policy', 'This policy safeguards employee privacy in remote work settings.', '2023-03-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (16, 'Remote Work Flexibility Policy', 'This policy promotes flexibility in remote work arrangements for employees.', '2023-04-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (17, 'Remote Work Reporting Policy', 'This policy defines the reporting procedures for employees working remotely.', '2023-05-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (18, 'Remote Work Collaboration Policy', 'This policy encourages collaboration among remote work teams.', '2023-06-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (19, 'Remote Work Performance Evaluation Policy', 'This policy sets the criteria for evaluating remote work performance.', '2023-07-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

INSERT INTO remote_work_policies (policy_id, policy_title, policy_description, effective_date, last_updated) VALUES (20, 'Remote Work Dispute Resolution Policy', 'This policy outlines the procedures for resolving disputes in remote work situations.', '2023-08-01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
